data.title: Ways to Give | How to Give a Donation
data.meta_description: There are many ways to give to help children in the U.S and around the world in need. Find a way to donate to children that works best for you.
data.text:
When you donate to Save the Children, you’re creating ripples of lasting change in children’s lives and, ultimately, the future we share.

Join us as a monthly donor and with your help, we can give children a better future.

Team Tomorrow is a radical new way to connect with causes you care about by offering a personalized experience.

Save the Children accepts multiple cryptocurrencies. Learn how to donate with cryptocurrency!

NEW! These gift boxes create moments that matter – both for the recipient and for children around the world. Makes a perfect gift – choose from three editions.

Give your loved ones the most meaningful gifts anytime– a gift that gives back. There's something for every occasion to benefit children in need.

Give in Honor

Honor family members or someone special. You can also make a memorial gift that helps children in need.

Honor a loved one’s legacy by making a gift in their memory. You’ll support children in need and provide them a brighter future.

Fundraise for Children

Whatever your passion—from athletics to creating with friends—by fundraising for children in need, you can make a difference.

Donate your birthday to Save the Children and change the lives of children.

Workplace Giving and Matching Gifts

Support Save the Children through a Workplace Giving campaign.

Double or even triple their donations to Save the Children through a Matching Gift program.

Investment Giving

Combine the most favorable tax benefits and tax deductions with the flexibility to easily support your favorite charities.

Gift planning can make a difference in the lives of children in the United States and around the world.

Donating Stock helps Save the Children continue its life saving mission.

When contributing via your IRA, your gift will be put to use immediately, allowing you to see the difference your donation is making for children.

Philanthropy

Save the Children builds impactful partnerships with a diverse portfolio of corporations that share our vision of investing in childhood.

Hundreds of foundations work with us to help us achieve positive outcomes for children.

We work with individuals, family foundations, wealth advisers and donor-advised funds to drive philanthropic giving in support of strategies that scale-up solutions to significant social problems.
